org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.query

Interface GridCacheSqlIndexMetadata

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GridCacheQueryManager.CacheSqlIndexMetadata

    public interface GridCacheSqlIndexMetadata
extends Externalizable
    Ignite index descriptor.

    All index descriptors can be obtained from GridCacheSqlMetadata.indexes(String) method.

    See Also:
    GridCacheSqlMetadata

        Gets name of the index.
        Returns:

      • fields

        Gets names of fields indexed by this index.

      • descending

        boolean descending(String field)
        Gets order of the index for each indexed field.
        Parameters:
        field - Field name.
        Returns:

        Gets whether this is a unique index.
        Returns:
